scripts.build-all: npm run build-aisagg && npm run build-aiscollision && npm run build-aisnocontact && npm run build-aisship && npm run build-aisusv && npm run build-aisviewer && npm run build-aistrack && npm run build-usvtrack
scripts.build-sabrs: npm run build-aisagg && npm run build-aisnocontact && npm run build-aistrack && npm run build-usvtrack
scripts.build-aisagg: cd AISAgg && docker build -t aisagg -f Dockerfile .
scripts.build-aiscollision: cd AISCollision && docker build -t aiscollision -f Dockerfile .
scripts.build-aisnocontact: cd AISNoContact && docker build -t aisnocontact -f Dockerfile .
scripts.build-aisusv: cd AISUSV && docker build -t aisusv -f Dockerfile .
scripts.build-aistrack: cd AISTrackChecker && docker build -t aistrack -f Dockerfile .
scripts.build-usvtrack: cd USVTrackChecker && docker build -t usvtrack -f Dockerfile .
scripts.build-aisvessel: cd AISVesselChecker && docker build -t aisvessel -f Dockerfile .
scripts.build-aisviewer: cd AISViewer && docker build -t aisviewer -f Dockerfile .
scripts.deploy-ais: npm run deploy-aisviewer && npm run deploy-aisnocontact && npm run deploy-aisagg && npm run deploy-aisship && npm run deploy-aisusv && npm run deploy-aistrack && npm run deploy-aisvessel && npm run deploy-usvtrack
scripts.deploy-sabrs: npm run deploy-aisagg && npm run deploy-aisnocontact && npm run deploy-aistrack && npm run deploy-aisvessel && npm run deploy-usvtrack
scripts.deploy-pulsar: docker run -d --network sabr_network -p 8080:8080 -p 6650:6650 --hostname pulsar --name pulsar madajaju/sabr_pulsar:standalone
scripts.kill-ais: docker kill aisagg aiscollision aisnocontact aisship aisusv aisviewer aistrack
scripts.remove-ais: docker rm --force aisagg aiscollision aisnocontact aisship aisusv aisviewer aistrack
scripts.destroy-ais: npm run kill-ais && npm run remove-ais
scripts.destroy-sabrs: docker rm --force aisagg aisnocontact aistrack aisvessel usvtrack
